person:biography.personal-details:content: Dr. Visakh P.M. (MSc, MPhil, PhD) is a prolific editor with more than 25 books already published. Now he is working as Assistant Professor in TUSUR University, Tomsk, Russia. He did his Post doc. Research in Tomsk Polytechnic University, Tomsk, Russia (2014-2017). He obtained his PhD, MPhil and MSc degreases from School of Chemical Sciences, Mahatma Gandhi University, Kottayam, kerala, India. He edited 25 books from Scrivener (Wiley), Springer, Royal Society of Chemistry, Elsevier and more than 10 books in press, (from Wiley, Springer, Royal Society of Chemistry and Elsevier). He has been invited as a visiting researcher in Russia (2014 to Present), Portugal (2013, 2014), Czech Republic (2012, 2013) Italy (2009, 2012), Argentina (2010) Sweden (2010, 2011, 2012), Switzerland (2010), Spain (2011, 2012), Slovenia (2011), France (2011), Belgium (2012) and Austria (2012) for his research work. He visited 12 countries; He visited 15 universities in Europe. He published 14 publications, 3 reviews and more than 24 book chapters. He has attended and presented more than 28 conferences, he has 508 citations and his h-index is 12. He acts as guest editor for 4 International Journals.
